name: Square Pong (Squabix)
description:
Square Pong is a video game inspired by the classic Pong.

In Square Pong, you have to block off sides of the screen so the ball can't escape! Try to keep it on your screen for as long as possible, or it's game over! Act with caution around the hexagon; it could turn the tide of the entire game!

This game is pretty calm and inspired by the more relaxed casual mobile games.

I made this game for the Geo Jam 2022 in ~16 hours using the Godot Game Engine.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys

Mouse movement

Joystick (Controller)

D-Pad (Controller)

Mobile (Swipe)
